page.title: 01A GENERAL VIEW.
page.content: The area to the south of Mansfied contains arable and mixed farmland , coniferous woodland and, in the north, built up areas. The residential area tends to be in the north-east, consisting mainly of private detached and semi-detached housing. The industry is mainly in the north-west, on a recently built industrial estate. There is a College of Further Education,two middle and one first schools (the latter with a nursery unit attached.) Harlow Wood Hospital is in an area of woodland owned by the Forestry Commission. There is also a rehabilitation centre,two parks with facilities for football, rugby and athletics. There are also two quarries, two churches and a crematorium.
